trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked clear go to x: (0) y: (0) point in direction (90 v) set [pi v] to [3.1415] set [radius v] to [50] move (radius) steps point in direction (0 v) pen down forever repeat (360) move ((((radius) * (2)) * (pi)) / (360)) steps turn ccw (1) degrees end turn cw (15) degrees change pen color by (10) end
